name: Culp, Inc.
description: Culp, Inc. is a leading global provider of textile products, primarily specializing in the design, manufacturing, and marketing of fabrics for the mattress and upholstery industries. Founded in 1989 and headquartered in High Point, North Carolina, Culp operates through two primary segments: Culp Home Fashions and Culp Upholstery Fabrics. The company is recognized for its innovative fabric solutions that cater to various styles and consumer preferences, providing products that are not only functional but also aesthetically pleasing. Culp's commitment to quality and sustainability is reflected in its use of advanced technologies and eco-friendly practices in production. With a diverse portfolio of fabrics, including knitted, woven, and printed textiles, Culp serves a broad range of customers across North America and internationally. The company aims to enhance the living spaces of customers by delivering exceptional textile products that combine comfort, durability, and style. Culp is dedicated to staying ahead of market trends and continuously improving its offerings through research and development, ensuring it meets the evolving needs of the textile market while maintaining a strong focus on customer satisfaction.
